com.foxhole.tools.spartan.entity
Interface IGameEntityObject

All Superinterfaces:
INonRenderableSpartanObject, ISpartanObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameEntity
public interface IGameEntityObject
extends INonRenderableSpartanObject

IGameEntityObject, represents a game token.

Author:
Tiago "Spiegel" Costa

addAction

void addAction(IGameActionObject action)
Adds an action to the list of this entity action. Since no name is give, the name of the action itself is taken into account.

Parameters:
action - The handle for the action

removeAction

Removes an action from the list of entity actions.

Parameters:
actionName - The action name

actionName - The name of the action
Returns:
The handle for the action, null if none is found.

getState

IGameStateObject getState(java.lang.String gameStateName)
Obtains a specific state of this entity.

Parameters:
gameStateName - The name of the state to obtain.
Returns:

addState

Adds a new state to the entity.

Parameters:

removeState

void removeState(IGameStateObject state)
Removes a state from the entity. If no state matches, nothing is done.

Parameters:
state - the state handle.
